title: 4 Dead and Dozens Injured in British Columbia Bus Crash
description: The authorities said an investigation was continuing but that “it is believed that extremely icy road conditions” caused the bus to roll over.

title: Your Monday Briefing
description: A special edition looking back at 2022.

title: Charles Charts a Path as a King for All Holiday Seasons
description: Adding a Hanukkah party and Diwali treats to the traditional Christmas address, King Charles III is publicly embracing a more inclusive monarchy in his first months.

title: Pope Francis’ Christmas Address Bemoans ‘Grave Famine of Peace’
description: Pope Francis urged the tens of thousands of faithful in St. Peter’s Square to pray for Ukraine and for others suffering in conflicts around the world.

title: Conservatives in Western Canada Pass Law Rejecting Federal Sovereignty
description: A new law in the province of Alberta radically circumscribes federal authority, advancing the agenda of the province’s far-right secessionist movement.

title: Covid Is Spreading Rapidly in China, New Signs Suggest
description: Even as official figures from the central government remain low, regional numbers point to explosive outbreaks and overstretched health care systems.

title: Times Past
description: We’re diving into The Times’s archives with the help of a professional.

title: U.N. Fears 180 Rohingya Refugees in Stranded Boat Are Dead
description: Families lost contact weeks ago with their relatives on the boat, the U.N. refugee agency says, while at least some of those on another boat adrift for weeks appear to have been rescued.

title: How Citizen Spies Foiled Putin’s Grand Plan for One Ukrainian City
description: A partisan cell in Kherson spied on, undermined and even hunted down Russian soldiers. Now that Vladimir V. Putin’s forces are gone, people feel free to talk — and to brag a little.

title: Another Day, Another Crash: Life by Britain’s Most Bashed Bridge
description: A railway bridge with a shallow underpass is bashed into by vehicles with startling regularity, causing mostly embarrassment, but sending cargo — flowers, bicycles, eggs and potatoes — flying onto the roadway.

title: Air-Raid Sirens Sound Across Ukraine on Christmas Morning
description: The alert was lifted in most areas after about two hours. The authorities in Ukraine had warned for days that Russia planned another wave of missile attacks.

title: Christmas in Ukraine: Flickering Lights, Patriotic Trees and Hope for Peace
description: One town is protecting a statue of St. Nick with sandbags, another is putting its Christmas tree underground and others are cranking up noisy generators to keep the holiday spirit alive.

title: Day 25: That Time an Orthodox Jew Celebrated Christmas
description: Alex Edelman, a comedian, recalls his family’s one-night fling with Christmas — undertaken as a mitzvah for a non-Jewish friend.
